summary: This bill proposes to name the Department of Veterans Affairs community-based outpatient clinic in Toms River, New Jersey, the "Leonard G. Bud Lomell VA Clinic." The bill includes findings detailing the life and heroic actions of Leonard G. 'Bud' Lomell, a World War II veteran and prominent local figure. The bill emphasizes Lomell's service, honors, and contributions to the community as justification for the clinic's naming.
